mapper.select: select count(*) from phone_project where project_name = #{projectName}

SELECT p.project_id AS projectId, p.project_name AS projectName, p.project_price AS projectPrice, COUNT(ph.phone_id) AS phoneCount FROM project p LEFT JOIN phone ph ON ph.phone_project_id = p.project_id GROUP BY p.project_id, p.project_name, p.project_price ORDER BY phoneCount DESC

SELECT pp.project_id AS projectId, pp.project_name AS projectName, pp.project_price AS projectPrice, pp.project_flag AS projectFlag, COUNT(*) AS phoneCount FROM phone_project pp LEFT JOIN phone p ON pp.project_name = p.project_name GROUP BY pp.project_id, pp.project_name, pp.project_price, pp.project_flag ORDER BY phoneCount DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM phone_project pp left join phone p on pp.project_name = p.project_name WHERE p.project_name = #{projectName}

SELECT r.region_id as regionId, r.region_name as regionName, r.region_mark as regionMark, p.project_price as projectPrice, COUNT(ph.phone_id) as phoneCount FROM region r CROSS JOIN project p LEFT JOIN phone ph ON r.region_id = ph.phone_region_id AND ph.phone_project_id = #{projectId} WHERE p.project_id = #{projectId} GROUP BY r.region_id, r.region_name, r.region_mark, p.project_price ORDER BY phoneCount DESC
SELECT project_id FROM project WHERE project_name = #{projectName} LIMIT 1
